org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.api.core

Interface AnalogReporter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Reporter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnalogReporterImpl

    public interface AnalogReporter
extends Reporter
    This interface extends the Reporter interface for the analog attribute.
    In fact, for the analog attribute a report is sent only if the value changes by a value
    that is greater than the ReportableChagne property.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULT_REPORTABLE_CHANGE_INTERVAL
      By default all the new AnalogReporter will reported when the value change is greater
      equal of the following value
